text: The flood continued upon the earth for forty days. As the waters increased, they lifted the ark, so that it rose above the earth.
Thus says the LORD: This is how you will know that I am the LORD. With the staff here in my hand, I will strike the water in the Nile and it will be changed into blood.
But what is left over of the meat of the sacrifice on the third day must be burned in the fire.
